build.buildCommand: npm install && npm run build:frontend && echo 'Checking available files...' && ls -la frontend/ && echo 'Checking public folder...' && ls -la frontend/public/ && echo 'Copying images to backend public folder...' && mkdir -p backend/public/images && (cp -r frontend/public/images/* backend/public/images/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No images to copy from frontend/public/images') && echo 'Images copied to backend/public/images:' && ls -la backend/public/images/ | head -5
